testcase.name: Check login is unsuccessfull with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User navigate on landing page..........................................passed Then Fields on navigation page are visible to the user......................passed Then User clicks on login button............................................passed Then User enters invalid "0000000000" mobile number.........................passed When User enters invalid OTP................................................passed Then User should get the error text on console..............................passed
